description: Returns a list of resource tags associated with the resource specified by the Amazon Resource Name (ARN).

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource. For a list of supported resources, see ResourceTag.

nested_items.name: ResourceTags
nested_items.description: A list of tag key value pairs that are associated with the resource.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key that's associated with the tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value that's associated with the tag.
